snippet: Business and political leaders in northeastern Japan are betting on a casino as the brightest hope to speed reconstruction in a region battered by the devastating 2011 earthquake and tsunami....

headline.print_headline: Lawmakers in Japan's Tsunami-Hit Region Eye Casino to Hasten Recovery
headline.main: Lawmakers in Japan's Tsunami-Hit Region Eye Casino to Hasten Recovery

lead_paragraph: Business and political leaders in northeastern Japan are betting on a casino as the brightest hope to speed reconstruction in a region battered by the devastating 2011 earthquake and tsunami.
